Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial infection causing dark, water-soaked spots on  leaves and fruits.
Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.precautions: Avoid overhead irrigation and ensure good field sanitation.
Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Apply copper-based bactericides to limit spread.

Pepper__bell___healthy.description: The  plant appears healthy with no visible disease symptoms.
Pepper__bell___healthy.precautions: Maintain balanced fertilization and regular crop monitoring.

Potato___Early_blight.description: Fungal disease causing brown concentric lesions on  leaves.
Potato___Early_blight.precautions: Practice crop rotation and remove infected plant debris.
Potato___Early_blight.treatment: Use fungicides containing mancozeb or chlorothalonil.

Potato___healthy.description: The  plant shows no signs of disease and is healthy.
Potato___healthy.precautions: Maintain proper irrigation and nutrient management.

Potato___Late_blight.description: A severe fungal disease leading to rapid leaf blight and tuber rot.
Potato___Late_blight.precautions: Avoid wet foliage and improve field drainage.
Potato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides such as copper hydroxide promptly.

Tomato__Target_Spot.description: Fungal disease characterized by dark target-like spots on leaves.
Tomato__Target_Spot.precautions: Ensure proper spacing and airflow between plants.

Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.description: Viral disease causing mottled leaves and stunted plant growth.
Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.precautions: Use certified disease-free seeds and disinfect tools.
Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.treatment: Remove infected plants; no chemical cure available.

Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.description: Viral infection causing yellowing, curling, and reduced fruit yield.
Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.precautions: Control whitefly vectors and use insect-proof nets.
Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.treatment: Remove severely infected plants; manage vectors.

Tomato_Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial disease producing small dark spots on plant foliage.
Tomato_Bacterial_spot.precautions: Avoid overhead watering and sterilize equipment.

Tomato_Early_blight.description: Fungal disease forming concentric brown lesions on leaves.
Tomato_Early_blight.precautions: Remove infected leaves and rotate crops.

Tomato_healthy.description: The  plant is healthy and free from disease.

Tomato_Late_blight.description: Highly destructive fungal disease affecting leaves and fruits.
Tomato_Late_blight.precautions: Avoid wet conditions and improve ventilation.

Tomato_Leaf_Mold.description: Fungal disease common in humid environments causing mold growth.

Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.description: Fungal disease causing circular spots with gray centers.
Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.precautions: Avoid splashing water on leaves and improve spacing.

Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.description: Pest infestation causing stippling, webbing, and leaf damage.
Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.precautions: Increase humidity and regularly monitor crops.
